item.title: Core Data Migration to Avoid Duplicate Entries

item.description: Core data migrations are easier said than done, isnâ€™t it? Although I love the fact that lightweight migration works out of the box, when it comes to other types of migrations, itâ€™s just too many tasks to remember, and it feels like Iâ€™m defusing a bomb.
